types.Entity: fields: entity_id str, components Dict, active bool
types.PositionComponent: fields: x float, y float, z float, velocity_x float, velocity_y float, velocity_z float
types.NetworkComponent: fields: last_update_time float, update_priority int, interested_clients Set
types.Event: fields: event_type str, timestamp float, source_entity str, data Dict
types.GameTime: fields: target_fps int, frame_duration float, current_frame int, game_time float, wall_start_time float, last_frame_time float
types.TestScenario: fields: name str, description str, success_criteria List
types.SpatialCell: fields: entities Set, level int, coordinates Tuple, bounds Tuple
types.SpatialHashGrid: fields: cell_levels Dict, entity_to_cell Dict, base_cell_size float, world_bounds Tuple
types.AoIShape: abstract base for interest region definitions
types.EllipticalAoI: fields: center coordinates, major_axis, minor_axis, rotation_y, cos_rot, sin_rot
types.InterestEntry: fields: entity_id str, distance float, last_update_time float, update_frequency float, priority_score float, in_interest bool
types.NetworkMessage: fields: message_type MessageType, entity_id str, sequence_number int, payload bytes, timestamp float, priority int
types.MessageType: enum: ENTITY_UPDATE, ENTITY_SPAWN, ENTITY_DESPAWN, DELTA_UPDATE, ACKNOWLEDGMENT, BASELINE_SYNC
types.PacketType: enum: POSITION_UPDATE, COMBAT_ACTION, ENTITY_SPAWN, ENTITY_DESPAWN, CHAT_MESSAGE, ACKNOWLEDGMENT
types.PacketHeader: fields: packet_type PacketType, sequence_number int, timestamp float, payload_length int, checksum int
types.NetworkMetrics: fields: rtt_samples deque, packet_loss_rate float, jitter_variance float, bandwidth_estimate float, last_update_time float
types.UDPNetworkSocket: socket wrapper with receive buffer management
types.GameStateSnapshot: fields: frame_number int, entities Dict, random_state bytes, accumulated_time float
types.VisualCorrection: fields: entity_id str, start_position Tuple, target_position Tuple, start_time float, duration float
types.PlayerInput: fields: frame int, player_id str, actions List, timestamp float, sequence_number int
types.Action: fields: type str, data Dict, timestamp float
types.FixedVector3: fields: x FixedPoint, y FixedPoint, z FixedPoint
types.MovementContext: fields: player_id str, old_position Tuple, new_position Tuple, velocity Tuple, timestamp float, sequence_number int
types.NetworkHealthMetrics: fields: rtt_samples deque, packet_loss_rate float, jitter_variance float, bandwidth_estimate float, last_update_time float, connection_state ConnectionState, consecutive_failures int
types.BoundaryStabilizer: fields: enter_threshold float, exit_threshold float, stability_time float
types.HotspotMetrics: fields: entity_count int, query_frequency float, update_frequency float, performance_degradation float, hotspot_detected bool
types.ConflictType: enum: TEMPORAL_ORDERING, RESOURCE_ACQUISITION, COMBAT_INTERACTION, AREA_EFFECT, CHAIN_REACTION
types.EventConflict: fields: conflict_type ConflictType, affected_entities Set, client_predictions Dict, server_authority Any, causal_dependencies List, resolution_priority int
types.SystemMetrics: fields: subsystem_name str, health_status SystemHealth, performance_percentile_95 float, error_rate float, throughput float, resource_usage float, last_updated float
types.NetworkProfile: fields: base_latency_ms float, jitter_variance_ms float, packet_loss_rate float, bandwidth_mbps float
types.SimulatedPacket: fields: payload bytes, destination str, inject_time float, delivery_time float, sequence_number int, dropped bool
types.NetworkSimulator: fields: profile NetworkProfile, packet_queue deque, delivery_callbacks Dict, running bool
types.LoadTestOrchestrator: fields: test_scenarios Dict, active_players Dict, metrics_collector MetricsCollector
types.MetricsCollector: fields: spatial_metrics Dict, network_metrics Dict, rollback_metrics Dict
types.ConnectionType: enum: FIBER, DSL, MOBILE_4G, SATELLITE, CONGESTED_WIFI
types.PacketCapture: fields: timestamp float, source_address str, destination_address str, packet_size int, packet_data bytes, packet_type str, sequence_number int
types.PerformanceMonitor: fields: update_interval float, metrics Dict, alert_handlers List
types.NetworkPacketAnalyzer: fields: interface_address str, capture_port int, captured_packets deque
types.ServerMeshNode: fields: server_id str, listen_port int, neighbors Dict, connections Dict, message_handlers Dict, vector_clock Dict, running bool
types.MeshMessage: fields: message_type MeshMessageType, source_server str, target_server str, payload Dict, vector_clock Dict, timestamp float
types.MeshMessageType: enum: HEARTBEAT, ENTITY_HANDOFF, INTEREST_SUBSCRIPTION, EVENT_COORDINATION, CONSENSUS_VOTE
types.HousingProject: fields: project_id str, owner_id str, collaborators Set, elements Dict, permissions Dict, created_timestamp float, last_modified float
types.BuildingElement: fields: element_id str, element_type BuildingElementType, position Tuple, rotation float, material ConstructionMaterial, dimensions Tuple, placed_by str, placed_timestamp float, health float
types.BuildingElementType: enum: FOUNDATION, WALL, DOOR, WINDOW, ROOF, FLOOR
types.CrossServerEntityHandoff: fields: server_mesh ServerMeshNode, spatial_system, rollback_system, pending_handoffs Dict, handoff_timeout float
types.CollaborativeConstructionManager: fields: housing_persistence HousingPersistence, spatial_system, active_locks Dict, construction_sessions Dict
types.HierarchicalCombatSystem: fields: spatial_system, interest_manager, engagement_zones Dict, combat_processing_budget float

methods.is_frame_ready() -> bool: checks if next frame should be processed
methods.add_entity(entity_id) -> bool: adds entity to cell, returns if subdivision needed
methods.contains_point(x, y, z) -> bool: tests if point lies within AoI shape
methods.distance_to_point(x, y, z) -> float: calculates minimum distance from point to shape boundary
methods.update_entity_position(entity_id, new_x,: updates entity position in spatial system
methods._hash_position(x, y, z, level) -> Tuple[: converts world coordinates to cell coordinates for given level
methods._get_neighbor_cells(center_coords, level: gets all cell coordinates within radius of center cell
methods.get_overlapping_cells(cell_size) -> Set[: returns spatial grid cells that shape overlaps
methods.update_player_aoi(player_id, aoi_shape): updates player's Area of Interest shape
methods.update_interest_frequencies(player_id): recalculates update frequencies for entities in AoI
methods.get_entities_needing_updates(player_id,: returns entities that need updates sent to player
methods.apply_delta_update(client_id, entity_id,: applies delta update to reconstruct entity state
methods.get_boundary_crossings(time_interval) ->: predicts AoI boundary crossings in time interval
methods.create_snapshot() -> GameStateSnapshot: creates complete snapshot of current game state for rollback
methods.restore_snapshot(frame_number: int) -> b: restores game state to specific frame snapshot
methods.process_server_update(server_frame: int,: processes authoritative server update and rollbacks if necessary
methods._perform_rollback(target_frame: int, cor: executes core rollback and resimulation algorithm
methods._calculate_state_difference(local_entiti: calculates total difference between local and server state
methods._resimulate_frames(start_frame: int, end: resimulates range of frames with given inputs
methods.apply_rollback_correction(entity: Entity: applies smooth visual correction for rollback position change
methods.update_visual_positions(current_time: fl: updates entity visual positions with active corrections
methods.get_inputs_for_frame(frame: int) -> List: gets all player inputs for specific frame
methods.get_inputs_since_frame(start_frame: int): gets all inputs from start_frame to latest frame
methods.magnitude_squared() -> FixedPoint: calculates squared magnitude of fixed point vector
methods.dot(other: FixedVector3) -> FixedPoint: calculates dot product of two fixed point vectors
methods.to_float() -> float: converts fixed point to floating point representation
methods.detect_packet_loss(client_id, expected_s: detect packet loss from sequence gaps
methods.detect_temporal_conflicts(client_events,: identify conflicts between predictions and authority
methods.build_dependency_graph(conflicts) -> Dic: build dependency graph for conflict resolution
methods.execute_scenario(scenario_name, player_c: execute test scenario with player count
methods.start_mesh_node() returns server: start WebSocket server and neighbor connections
methods.send_mesh_message(target_server, message: send message to specific mesh server
methods.is_frame_ready(): checks if next frame should be processed
methods.contains_point(x, y, z): tests if point lies within AoI shape
methods.distance_to_point(x, y, z): calculates minimum distance from point to shape boundary
methods._hash_position(x, y, z, level): converts world coordinates to cell coordinates
methods.get_overlapping_cells(cell_size): returns spatial grid cells that shape overlaps
methods.apply_delta_update(client_id, entity_id,: applies delta update to reconstruct state
methods.restore_snapshot(frame_number): restores game state to specific frame
methods._calculate_state_difference(local_entiti: calculates difference between local and server state
methods._resimulate_frames(start_frame, end_fram: resimulates frame range with given inputs
methods.update_visual_positions(current_time, en: updates entity visual positions with corrections
methods.get_inputs_for_frame(frame): gets all player inputs for specific frame
methods.get_inputs_since_frame(start_frame): gets all inputs from start_frame to latest
methods.magnitude_squared(): calculates squared magnitude of fixed point vector
methods.dot(other): calculates dot product of fixed point vectors
methods.to_float(): converts fixed point to floating point
methods.detect_packet_loss(client_id, expected_s: detect packet loss from sequence gaps
methods.detect_temporal_conflicts(client_events,: identify conflicts between predictions and authority
methods.build_dependency_graph(conflicts): build dependency graph for conflict resolution
methods.execute_scenario(scenario_name, player_c: execute test scenario with player count
methods.start_mesh_node(): start WebSocket server and neighbor connections

constants.distance_weight: 0.4 weight for distance factor in priority
constants.velocity_weight: 0.2 weight for velocity factor in priority
constants.interaction_weight: 0.25 weight for interaction history in priority
constants.enter_threshold: 0.8 - fraction of cell size to enter
constants.exit_threshold: 0.2 - fraction of cell size to exit

terms.spatial partitioning: dividing world space into manageable regions
terms.interest management: filtering updates to send only relevant information
terms.client-side prediction: showing immediate results on client before server confirmation
terms.rollback netcode: rewinding and replaying game state when predictions wrong
terms.area of interest: region around player where they receive detailed updates
terms.deterministic simulation: simulation producing identical results from same inputs
terms.lag compensation: server technique to account for network delay
terms.k-nearest neighbor: algorithm for finding closest entities to query point
terms.frustum culling: determining which entities are visible within camera view volume
terms.SIMD: Single Instruction Multiple Data - vectorized operations
terms.octree: hierarchical spatial data structure with recursive 8-way subdivision
terms.spatial hash grid: grid-based spatial partitioning using hash functions
terms.hysteresis: using different thresholds for state changes to prevent oscillation
terms.temporal decay: reducing influence of old data over time
terms.priority inversion: high-priority tasks delayed by lower-priority tasks
terms.boundary oscillation: rapid add/remove cycles near spatial boundaries
terms.thundering herd: synchronized update storms in dense player areas
terms.bit-packing: efficient binary encoding at bit level
terms.congestion control: managing send rates based on network conditions
terms.head-of-line blocking: single lost packet blocking all subsequent data
terms.fixed timestep: simulation advancing in consistent time increments
terms.game state snapshot: complete capture of simulation state at specific frame
terms.visual correction: smoothing techniques to hide rollback discontinuities
terms.misprediction: when client prediction differs from server authority
terms.resimulation: replaying simulation frames with corrected inputs
terms.temporal conflict resolution: handling actions that conflict across time periods
terms.hotspot: spatial regions with excessive entity density
terms.temporal conflict: conflicts in event ordering between predictions and authority
terms.cascade failure: failures that propagate across multiple subsystems
terms.conflict resolution: resolving differences between client predictions and server authority
terms.dependency graph: relationships between game systems and elements
terms.compensating action: corrective measures to address rollback conflicts
terms.milestone validation checkpoints: specific tests verifying subsystem acceptance criteria
terms.load testing: validating performance under target player counts
terms.network condition simulation: testing under various latency and packet loss scenarios
terms.behavioral simulation: modeling realistic player movement and interaction patterns
terms.graduated load testing: incrementally increasing player count to identify bottlenecks
terms.adversarial network testing: testing robustness against hostile network conditions
terms.deterministic repeatability: ability to replay exact test scenarios for validation
terms.distributed log correlation: tracing issues across multiple system components
terms.server mesh: network of interconnected game servers managing single persistent world
terms.cross-server spatial boundaries: overlap zones where entities transition between server authority
terms.interest proxy: lightweight representation of remote player interest
terms.distributed event ordering: maintaining consistent event sequence across servers
terms.vector clocks: logical timestamps for causal event ordering
terms.persistent housing: player-built structures that survive server restarts
terms.dynamic spatial integration: updating spatial partitioning for mutable geometry
terms.hierarchical engagement zones: combat areas with different simulation fidelity
terms.scalable combat system: algorithms that handle variable player counts
terms.localized spatial rebuilding: minimal spatial updates for environmental changes
terms.simulation fidelity scaling: adjusting processing detail based on importance
